post.description:
This endpoint will provide, where possible, an estimate of pricing and fulfillment center assignment of a potential standard (direct to consumer) order. 
Keep in mind that there are ways for the merchant to change FC assignment or product configuration after order creation that could invalidate this estimate. 
Estimates cannot be returned for items that are unknown, out of stock, or too large for fulfillment using standard box sizes. 
Additional services such as high-pick fees, shipping insurance, auto-splitting or auto-adding items to orders, and signature required are not included in this estimate.

401.description: No access right at this time
No access right at this time

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Amount of orders per page to request

parameters.name: IDs
parameters.description:
order ids to filter by, comma separated
Example: ?IDs=1,2

parameters.name: ReferenceIds
parameters.description:
Reference ids to filter by, comma separated
Example: ?ReferenceIds=Ref1,Ref2

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: Start date to filter orders inserted later than

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: End date to filter orders inserted earlier than

parameters.name: HasTracking
parameters.description: Has any portion of this order been assigned a tracking number

parameters.name: LastUpdateStartDate
parameters.description: Start date to filter orders updated later than

parameters.name: LastUpdateEndDate
parameters.description: End date to filter orders updated later than

parameters.name: IsTrackingUploaded
parameters.description: Filter orders that their tracking information was fully uploaded

parameters.name: LastTrackingUpdateStartDate
parameters.description: Start date to filter orders with tracking updates later than the supplied date. Will only return orders that have tracking information

parameters.name: LastTrackingUpdateEndDate
parameters.description: End date to filter orders updated later than the supplied date. Will only return orders that have tracking information

ShipBob.Orders.Presentation.Models.AddSt.description: Model for adding a Store Order Json to a ShipBob Order.

is_tracking_uploaded.description:
Indicates whether the Shipment was marked with tracking information
uploaded to a third-party system where the order originated.
Applies to all shipments in shipment_ids

shipment_ids.description: Shipment IDs to apply the tracking upload status to

ShipBob.Orders.Presentation.Models.BulkU.description: Model for updating tracking upload status for multiple shipments

ShipBob.Orders.Presentation.Models.Cance.description: Model for cancel multiple shipments at once

shipping_method.description: Client-defined shipping method matching what the user has listed as the shipping method on the Ship Option Mapping setup page in the ShipBob Merchant Portal. If they dont match, we will create a new one and default it to Standard

products.description: Products included in the order. Products identified by reference_id must also include the product name if there is no matching ShipBob product.

reference_id.description: Unique and immutable order identifier from your upstream system

order_number.description: User friendly orderId or store order number that will be shown on the Orders Page. If not provided, referenceId will be used

tags.description: Key value pair array to store extra information at the order level for API purposes. ShipBob won't display the info in the ShipBob Merchant Portal or react based on this data.

purchase_date.description: Date this order was purchase by the end user

location_id.description: Desired Fulfillment Center Location ID. If not specified, ShipBob will determine the location that fulfills this order.

gift_message.description: Gift message associated with the order

shipping_methods.description:
Array of strings specifying shipping methods for which to fetch estimates.

If this field is omitted we will return estimates for all shipping methods defined in ShipBob

products.description: Products to be included in the order. Each product must include one of reference_id or id

id.description: Unique id of the product (Must be provided if reference_id is unknown)

reference_id.description: Unique reference id of the product (Must be provided if ID is unknown)

quantity.description: The quantity of this product ordered

total_price.description: Sum of all line item prices, discounts, and taxes in USD

is_tracking_uploaded.description:
Indicates whether the Shipment was marked with tracking information
uploaded to a third-party system where the order originated.

Address to used when creating a B2B/DropShip order.

purchase_order_number.description: First initial documentation sent from buyer to seller with item(s) and quantities.

addresses.description:
Ship From - Certain retailers want to display the ship from address as their return facility, not Shipbobs warehouse address        /// 
Mark For Address - Final destination address

shipByDate.description: The date the retailer has requested the order to ship by.

doNotShipBeforeDate.description: The date the retailer does not want the order shipped by.

ShipBob.Orders.Presentation.ViewModels.R.description: Contains properties that needs to be used for fulfilling B2B/Dropship orders.

id.description: Unique id for the service level

name.description: The name or title of the service level

active.description: Indicates if the shipping method is active

default.description: Indicates the shipping method is a ShipBob default shipping method.

name.description: Name of the ship method as selected by the merchant and saved in ShipBobs database (i.e. ground). Corresponds to the shipping_method field in the Orders API.

log_type_id.description: Log type id of the shipment

reference_id.description: Unique reference id of the product

sku.description: Stock keeping unit for the product

ShipBob.Orders.Presentation.ViewModels.S.description: Information about a store product belonging to a shipment

order_id.description: Id of the order this shipment belongs to

reference_id.description: Client-defined external unique id of the order this shipment belongs to

last_update_at.description: Date this shipment was last updated

last_tracking_update_at.description: Timestamp for the last time this shipment had a tracking update

status_details.description: Additional details about the shipment status

insurance_value.description: Monetary amount that this shipment was insured for

ship_option.description: Name of the shipping option used for this shipment

products.description: Information about the products contained in this shipment

estimated_fulfillment_date.description:
The datetime of ShipBobs commitment for completing
the shipment and handing to the carrier for delivery.

actual_fulfillment_date.description:
The datetime of ShipBobs completion of the fulfillment operation as promised.
Currently, this means the shipment has been picked, packed, and label has been printed.

is_tracking_uploaded.description:
Indicates whether the Shipment was marked with tracking information
uploaded to a third-party system where the order originated.

gift_message.description: Gift message associated with the shipment

delivery_date.description: The datetime of Shipment delivered to customer.

description.description: Describes what the status detail means

bol.description: Bill of lading (BOL) number. Document acknowledging receipt of cargo for shipment.

pro_number.description: Tracking number used for freight carriers

scac.description: Standard Carrier Alpha Code (SCAC). Unique 2-4 letter code used to identify transportation companies.
